title: roasted spicy leg of lamb
description: This leg of lamb is slightly spicy, lemony, and at first bite, a little sweet. Honey and lemon is a fantastic combination and the spices just add to it. As with all roast lamb, it needs time to marinate properly and takes time to cook.
ingredients: 15g/½oz fresh ginger, peeled and roughly chopped
6 large cloves garlic, peeled and roughly chopped
